short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically group tabs by their domain or subdomain. Smart colors for tab groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Group Tabs Automatically" is a helpful little tool that automatically organizes your tabs into groups based on either domain or subdomain. Enable "Group Tabs Automatically" in the extension popup, and your tabs will be sorted into intelligently colored groups. Any new tabs you create will be automatically organized. Requires a one-time payment.

Key Features:

- Automatic Tab Grouping: Your tabs are automatically grouped by domain or subdomain.
- Alphabetical Sorting: Find groups easily with the option to sort tab groups alphabetically.
- Close Single Tab Groups: Maintain a tidy workspace with the option to close single tab groups.
- Collapse Unused Groups: Focus on what matters with the option to automatically collapse unused tab groups, leaving only the group of the tab you're focused on open.
- Intelligent Colors: The extension assigns colors to tab groups based on the site icon's color, enabling you to easily scan groups at a glance.
